description: A JavaScript module defining a reusable, themed IconButton component for a frontend application, utilizing LightningJS for rendering and styling. The component includes configurable properties, dynamic styling based on theme, and interaction handling with hover, focus, active, and disabled states.

classes.name: IconButton
classes.description: A reusable, themed icon button with hover, focus ring, active, and disabled states, extending LightningJS's Component class.

methods.name: _template()
methods.description: Defines the initial visual structure of the IconButton component, including the button shape, focus ring, icon, and label.

methods.name: _construct()
methods.description: Initializes default properties and states for the component.

methods.name: props
methods.description: Getter and setter for the component's properties; updating the button's appearance and behavior when set.

methods.name: _applyProps()
methods.description: Applies current properties to update styles, sizes, colors, and interaction states dynamically.

methods.name: _focus()
methods.description: Handles rendering the focus ring when the component gains focus.

methods.name: _unfocus()
methods.description: Removes the focus ring when the component loses focus.

methods.name: _handleEnter()
methods.description: Invokes the onClick callback if defined when the button is pressed.

methods.name: _handleClick()
methods.description: Alias for handling click events, calls _handleEnter.

methods.name: _handleMouseEnter()
methods.description: Handles hover state when mouse enters the component, with a scale animation.

methods.name: _handleMouseLeave()
methods.description: Resets hover and pressed states when mouse leaves, with scale animation.

methods.name: _handleMouseDown()
methods.description: Sets pressed state on mouse down, providing visual feedback.

methods.name: _handleMouseUp()
methods.description: Resets pressed state and applies scale when mouse is released.
